12.1.hd_quote: If you are not in the mood, you can't bring mutation.
12.1.behavioral_axis: Withdraws from social contact until the mood arrives to articulate mutation, requiring communal support for periods of creative isolation.
12.1.shadow_axis: Withdraws absurdly into extreme isolation, losing the capacity to articulate or experiencing muteness even when mutation is ready.
12.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

12.2.hd_quote: They are always projecting out that they are not interested.
12.2.behavioral_axis: Projects a natural field of disinterest, called out only when they've unknowingly ripened a mutation worth articulating socially.
12.2.shadow_axis: Says no reflexively without knowing why, becoming bored and confused by their own restrained nature and lack of stimulation.
12.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

12.3.hd_quote: These are people that hate or are hated and, mostly, the hatred in them is self-hatred.
12.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments socially through bonds made and broken, learning through painful trial-and-error when their mutation can be adequately explained.
12.3.shadow_axis: Drowns in perverse and exaggerated self-hatred after failed social interactions, unable to separate inadequate timing from personal inadequacy.
12.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

12.4.hd_quote: Prophets show up exactly at the right time: when people are ready to hear their word.
12.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes mutation by foreseeing when the emotional field is ready, waiting to articulate the mutative message at exactly the right moment.
12.4.shadow_axis: Speaks into the wilderness with speech impediments or poor timing, unable to get their mutative message across to deaf ears.
12.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

12.5.hd_quote: It is projected on all 12th gate people that they are pragmatic, that they are cautious and that they are careful.
12.5.behavioral_axis: Receives projections of being pragmatic and social, developing special social skills through repeated projected experience with the emotional field.
12.5.shadow_axis: Remembers only the most painful social lessons, becoming overly cautious and avoiding potentially valuable interactions from conditioned fear.
12.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

12.6.hd_quote: Faith in, and energy applied towards change and emergence from standstill.
12.6.behavioral_axis: Waits with faith for the major social mutation to emerge, embodying the objective example of what new mutative forms can bring to humanity.
12.6.shadow_axis: Accepts social limitations as perfected and permanent, refusing to engage because the full mutation hasn't manifested yet and won't be worth the effort.
12.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
